name: Colin views information about each product

testSteps.description: Given Colin has logged onto the application
When Colin is browsing the product catalog

Then he should be presented with the following products:
| Title | Price |
| Sauce Labs Backpack | $29.99 |
| Sauce Labs Bike Light | $9.99 |
| Sauce Labs Bolt T-Shirt | $15.99 |
| Sauce Labs Fleece Jacket | $49.99 |
| Sauce Labs Onesie | $7.99 |
| Test.allTheThings() T-Shirt (Red) | $15.99 |

children.description: he should see the 'inventory_item' element containing text 'Sauce Labs Backpack' that is displayed
he should see the 'inventory_item' element containing text 'Sauce Labs Backpack' with text content that contains: <[$29.99]>
he should see the 'inventory_item' element containing text 'Sauce Labs Bike Light' that is displayed
he should see the 'inventory_item' element containing text 'Sauce Labs Bike Light' with text content that contains: <[$9.99]>
he should see the 'inventory_item' element containing text 'Sauce Labs Bolt T-Shirt' that is displayed
he should see the 'inventory_item' element containing text 'Sauce Labs Bolt T-Shirt' with text content that contains: <[$15.99]>
he should see the 'inventory_item' element containing text 'Sauce Labs Fleece Jacket' that is displayed
he should see the 'inventory_item' element containing text 'Sauce Labs Fleece Jacket' with text content that contains: <[$49.99]>
he should see the 'inventory_item' element containing text 'Sauce Labs Onesie' that is displayed
he should see the 'inventory_item' element containing text 'Sauce Labs Onesie' with text content that contains: <[$7.99]>
he should see the 'inventory_item' element containing text 'Test.allTheThings() T-Shirt (Red)' that is displayed
he should see the 'inventory_item' element containing text 'Test.allTheThings() T-Shirt (Red)' with text content that contains: <[$15.99]>

title: Colin views information about each product

rule.name: Should show the price, description and image of each product
